--1: 说明：order可以在主表加其它字段，来分解成note。
order: -- this is comments. starts with #. order pushed when comfirmed or paid
detail: order-detail -- { name: detail, type: array, fields: order-detail }

order-detail.name: item
order-detail.-: if item is ID, the item is pack ID, include product ID, else item is pack, product must have value

order-detail.name: product
order-detail.-: my be undefined when item is ID

return-detail: -- price不需要, 在order detail id 里面可以获得
deliver-detail: quantity: number  -- 同一个合同明细可能会分多次不同数量发送
showPrice: number                  -- 单据上是否显示价格, 需要则1
json: string                       -- 只需要在界面展示的信息以json格式存储
deliver: -- 通用些的发运字段，一般不会变化
return: -- order-id: id -- ?? 可以没有 应该是直接没有
-- receive-return-done: -- receive-done 出现负值，就是return receive
-- invoice-return-done: -- invoice-done 出现负值，就是return invoice
order-binding: -- order id, binding可以是coupon，也可以是userid，或者其它标志。如果网页点击，可以直接带id
order-bound-detail: type: string  -- sales, person-client, 预定义的类型
id-type: string -- staff, customer, 如果没有值，id表示webUser
order-bound: -- order id, coupon体系根据coupon，找到order的绑定人
-- promoter: id  -- 推销人，销售，或者外部人员
to: order-bound-detail -- type: sales|client, id is sales id or client id
order-bound-profit: to: order-bound-detail -- type: sales|client, id is sales id or client id
order-bound-amount: to: order-bound-detail -- type: sales|client, id is sales id or client id
order-customer-points: to: order-bound-detail -- type: customer, id is customer person id
order-bound-staff-sales: to: order-bound-detail -- id is sales id or agent id
order-bound-agent: to: order-bound-detail -- id is sales id or agent id
order-bound-distributor: to: order-bound-detail -- id is sales id or agent id
order-bound-customer: to: order-bound-detail -- id is sales id or agent id
